tasks.title: Setup Project Infrastructure and Development Environment
tasks.description: Initialize the full-stack TypeScript project with Next.js frontend, Node.js/Express backend, PostgreSQL database, and Redis for real-time processing according to the specified tech stack.
tasks.details:
Create monorepo structure with:
- Frontend: Next.js 14+ with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Recharts for B2B visualizations
- Backend: Node.js with Express and TypeScript, Prisma ORM
- Database: PostgreSQL with the specified B2B schema (companies, visitor_sessions, revenue_events, automation_actions tables)
- Cache: Redis for real-time processing
- Infrastructure: Configure for Vercel Pro (frontend) and Railway/Render (backend)
- Setup development environment with proper TypeScript configs, ESLint, Prettier
- Initialize CI/CD pipeline for automated testing and deployment
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all services start correctly, database migrations run successfully, TypeScript compilation works without errors, and basic health check endpoints return 200 status codes.

subtasks.title: Monorepo Configuration Setup
subtasks.description: Configure the monorepo structure using tools like Lerna, Nx, or Turborepo to manage multiple packages and applications in a single repository
subtasks.details: Set up workspace configuration, package management, shared dependencies, build orchestration, and inter-package linking. Configure root-level package.json, workspace settings, and establish folder structure for apps and packages.

subtasks.title: Frontend Next.js Application Setup
subtasks.description: Initialize and configure the Next.js frontend application with TypeScript, routing, and essential dependencies
subtasks.details: Create Next.js app within monorepo structure, configure TypeScript, set up pages/app router, configure next.config.js, install UI libraries, set up styling solution (CSS modules/Tailwind), and configure build settings.

subtasks.title: Backend Node.js/Express API Setup
subtasks.description: Set up the Node.js backend API using Express framework with TypeScript, middleware, and routing structure
subtasks.details: Initialize Express server, configure TypeScript compilation, set up middleware (CORS, body-parser, helmet), create route structure, configure error handling, set up logging, and establish API versioning.

subtasks.title: PostgreSQL Database Initialization
subtasks.description: Set up PostgreSQL database with schema design, migrations, and connection configuration
subtasks.details: Install PostgreSQL, create database instances for different environments, design initial schema, set up migration system (using tools like Prisma, TypeORM, or Knex), configure connection pooling, and establish backup strategies.

subtasks.title: Redis Configuration and Integration
subtasks.description: Configure Redis for caching, session management, and real-time features
subtasks.details: Install and configure Redis server, set up Redis client in backend application, configure caching strategies, implement session storage, set up pub/sub for real-time features, and configure Redis clustering if needed.

subtasks.title: Development Tooling Configuration
subtasks.description: Set up development tools including linting, formatting, testing frameworks, and pre-commit hooks
subtasks.details: Configure ESLint and Prettier, set up Jest/Vitest for testing, configure Husky for git hooks, set up commitlint, configure VS Code settings, set up debugging configurations, and establish code quality standards.

subtasks.title: Environment-Specific Configurations
subtasks.description: Create environment-specific configuration files and secrets management for development, staging, and production
subtasks.details: Set up environment variables management, create .env files for different environments, configure secrets management, set up configuration validation, implement feature flags system, and establish environment-specific database and Redis configurations.

subtasks.title: Deployment Pipeline Setup
subtasks.description: Configure CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment across different environments
subtasks.details: Set up GitHub Actions/GitLab CI or similar, configure automated testing pipeline, set up build and deployment scripts, configure Docker containers, set up cloud deployment (AWS/GCP/Azure), implement blue-green deployment strategy, and configure monitoring and alerting.

tasks.title: Implement Universal B2B Visitor Tracking System
tasks.description: Build the core visitor tracking script (<8KB) that captures anonymous visitor behavior, detects B2B companies via IP-to-company mapping, and processes data in real-time within 1 second.
tasks.details:
Create lightweight tracking script with:
- Anonymous visitor session management with unique session IDs
- IP-to-company mapping integration for firmographic detection (90%+ B2B accuracy)
- Behavioral tracking: page flows, content engagement, document downloads, pricing research
- Technology stack detection and company size estimation
- Real-time data streaming to backend via WebSocket
- GDPR/SOC2 compliant data collection (anonymous processing only)
- Zero impact on Core Web Vitals performance
- Universal compatibility across WordPress, HubSpot, Salesforce Sites, Shopify Plus
- Integration with existing analytics (GA, Adobe, Mixpanel)
tasks.testStrategy: Test script size (<8KB), performance impact (no Core Web Vitals degradation), cross-platform compatibility, real-time data transmission accuracy, and GDPR compliance. Validate 90%+ accuracy in B2B company detection.

subtasks.title: Lightweight Script Architecture
subtasks.description: Design and implement a modular, ultra-lightweight JavaScript architecture that stays under 8KB while maintaining high performance and extensibility
subtasks.details: Create a micro-framework with module loading, event system, and plugin architecture. Implement code splitting, tree shaking, and aggressive minification strategies. Design async loading patterns and lazy initialization to minimize initial payload.

subtasks.title: Session Management System
subtasks.description: Develop a robust session management system that tracks user sessions across page loads and browser sessions with minimal overhead
subtasks.details: Implement session ID generation, storage mechanisms (localStorage/sessionStorage/cookies), session persistence, timeout handling, and cross-tab synchronization. Include session fingerprinting and validation.

subtasks.title: IP-to-Company Mapping Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate IP geolocation and company identification services to map visitor IPs to company information with 90%+ accuracy
subtasks.details: Implement API integration with IP intelligence providers, caching mechanisms, fallback strategies, and data enrichment. Handle rate limiting, error handling, and data validation for company identification.

subtasks.title: Behavioral Tracking Implementation
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive behavioral tracking system to monitor user interactions, page views, scroll depth, and engagement metrics
subtasks.details: Implement event listeners for clicks, scrolls, form interactions, time on page, mouse movements, and custom events. Create efficient data collection, batching, and queue management systems.

subtasks.title: Technology Detection
subtasks.description: Develop technology stack detection capabilities to identify frameworks, CMS, analytics tools, and other technologies used on visited websites
subtasks.details: Implement DOM analysis, JavaScript object detection, HTTP header analysis, and pattern matching for technology identification. Create signature database and detection algorithms.

subtasks.title: Real-time WebSocket Communication
subtasks.description: Implement WebSocket-based real-time communication system for instant data transmission and live updates
subtasks.details: Build WebSocket connection management, reconnection logic, message queuing, heartbeat mechanisms, and real-time event streaming. Handle connection failures and implement fallback mechanisms.

subtasks.title: GDPR Compliance Features
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive GDPR compliance features including consent management, data anonymization, and privacy controls
subtasks.details: Build consent banner system, cookie categorization, data retention policies, user rights management (access, deletion, portability), and privacy-by-design features. Implement opt-out mechanisms and data minimization.

subtasks.title: Performance Optimization
subtasks.description: Optimize script performance through advanced techniques to ensure minimal impact on host website performance
subtasks.details: Implement lazy loading, code splitting, memory management, CPU throttling, request batching, and performance monitoring. Optimize for Core Web Vitals and implement resource prioritization.

subtasks.title: Cross-platform Compatibility Testing
subtasks.description: Conduct comprehensive testing across browsers, devices, and platforms to ensure universal compatibility and consistent functionality
subtasks.details: Test on major browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge), mobile devices, different OS versions, and various screen sizes. Implement polyfills, feature detection, and graceful degradation strategies.

subtasks.title: Analytics Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate with analytics platforms and build comprehensive reporting dashboard for tracking and analyzing collected data
subtasks.details: Build data pipeline, reporting APIs, dashboard interface, real-time metrics, custom event tracking, and integration with third-party analytics platforms. Implement data visualization and export capabilities.

tasks.title: Build AI Revenue Prediction Engine with Industry-Specific Models
tasks.description: Develop the core ML-powered revenue prediction algorithm that scores visitors 0-100 and predicts deal size, close probability, and time to close with 92%+ accuracy across different industries.
tasks.details:
Implement revenue intelligence system with:
- Core scoring algorithm combining firmographic (0-30 pts), behavioral (0-25 pts), intent (0-25 pts), and timing (0-20 pts) factors
- Industry-specific models for SaaS, Consulting, Manufacturing with tailored signals
- Real-time prediction updates based on visitor behavior
- Buyer profile classification (enterprise_decision_maker, mid_market_evaluator, smb_owner, individual_user)
- Competitive intelligence integration for enhanced scoring
- Account-based marketing compatibility
- Confidence scoring and prediction accuracy tracking
- Revenue attribution engine for pipeline value calculation
tasks.testStrategy: Validate 92%+ prediction accuracy through backtesting with historical data, test industry-specific model performance, verify real-time scoring updates, and ensure prediction consistency across different visitor profiles.

subtasks.title: Core Scoring Algorithm Development
subtasks.description: Design and implement the foundational machine learning algorithm that combines multiple data inputs to generate lead scores with 92%+ accuracy
subtasks.details: Develop ensemble ML models using gradient boosting, neural networks, and random forests. Implement feature engineering pipeline, model selection framework, and hyperparameter optimization. Create scoring normalization and calibration mechanisms.

subtasks.title: Firmographic Data Processing
subtasks.description: Build data ingestion and processing pipeline for company demographic information including size, industry, revenue, location, and organizational structure
subtasks.details: Create ETL pipelines for external data sources, implement data validation and cleansing rules, establish data quality metrics, and build automated enrichment workflows for missing firmographic attributes.

subtasks.title: Behavioral Analysis Engine
subtasks.description: Develop system to track, analyze, and score prospect behavioral patterns across digital touchpoints
subtasks.details: Implement event tracking for website visits, email engagement, content downloads, social media interactions. Build behavioral scoring models, session analysis, and engagement pattern recognition algorithms.

subtasks.title: Intent Signal Detection
subtasks.description: Create advanced system to identify and quantify buying intent signals from various data sources
subtasks.details: Develop NLP models for content analysis, implement third-party intent data integration, create signal strength algorithms, and build intent decay models for temporal relevance.

subtasks.title: Timing Factor Calculation
subtasks.description: Build predictive models to determine optimal timing for sales engagement based on prospect lifecycle stage and market conditions
subtasks.details: Implement time-series analysis for engagement patterns, create seasonal adjustment models, develop urgency scoring algorithms, and build optimal contact timing recommendations.

subtasks.title: Industry-Specific Model Training
subtasks.description: Develop and train specialized machine learning models tailored to different industry verticals and market segments
subtasks.details: Create industry classification system, build vertical-specific feature sets, train separate models for each industry, implement model versioning and A/B testing framework for industry models.

subtasks.title: Buyer Profile Classification
subtasks.description: Implement system to classify and categorize prospects into distinct buyer personas and decision-maker roles
subtasks.details: Develop persona classification algorithms, create role-based scoring adjustments, implement hierarchical classification models, and build persona-specific engagement recommendations.

subtasks.title: Competitive Intelligence Integration
subtasks.description: Build system to incorporate competitive landscape data and market positioning into lead scoring calculations
subtasks.details: Implement competitive data ingestion pipelines, create market share analysis models, develop competitive threat scoring, and build win/loss probability adjustments based on competitive factors.

subtasks.title: Real-Time Prediction Updates
subtasks.description: Develop infrastructure for continuous model inference and real-time score updates as new data becomes available
subtasks.details: Build streaming data processing pipeline, implement real-time feature computation, create incremental learning capabilities, and establish low-latency prediction serving infrastructure.

subtasks.title: Confidence Scoring
subtasks.description: Implement system to calculate and communicate prediction confidence levels alongside lead scores
subtasks.details: Develop uncertainty quantification methods, implement confidence interval calculations, create data quality impact assessment, and build confidence-based recommendation thresholds.

subtasks.title: Accuracy Tracking
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive system to monitor, measure, and report on model accuracy and performance metrics
subtasks.details: Implement automated model validation pipelines, create performance dashboards, build drift detection algorithms, and establish continuous monitoring and alerting for accuracy degradation.

subtasks.title: Revenue Attribution Logic
subtasks.description: Develop system to track and attribute revenue outcomes to lead scores and model predictions for ROI measurement
subtasks.details: Implement revenue tracking integration, create attribution modeling algorithms, build ROI calculation frameworks, and develop closed-loop reporting for sales outcome correlation with lead scores.

tasks.title: Create Autonomous Revenue Optimization and Personalization System
tasks.description: Build the real-time website personalization engine that automatically triggers industry-specific interventions based on revenue potential and visitor behavior patterns.
tasks.details:
Develop intervention framework with:
- Real-time trigger system based on revenue scores and firmographic data
- Industry-specific personalization strategies (enterprise experience, mid-market focus, competitive defense)
- Account-based personalization for known target companies
- Progressive profiling for lead nurturing workflows
- Multi-variate testing framework for conversion optimization
- Dynamic content delivery based on visitor intelligence
- Automated experience customization (pricing displays, case studies, CTAs)
- Integration with existing website platforms for seamless personalization
- Performance tracking and optimization recommendations
tasks.testStrategy: Test personalization trigger accuracy, measure conversion rate improvements (target 40%+), validate A/B testing framework functionality, and ensure seamless integration across different website platforms.

subtasks.title: Real-time Trigger System
subtasks.description: Develop a sophisticated trigger system that responds to user behaviors, interactions, and contextual signals in real-time to initiate personalized experiences
subtasks.details: Build event-driven architecture with behavioral tracking, session monitoring, engagement scoring, and instant trigger activation based on predefined rules and machine learning algorithms

subtasks.title: Industry-specific Personalization Strategies
subtasks.description: Create tailored personalization approaches and content strategies for different industry verticals and business sectors
subtasks.details: Research industry-specific user journeys, pain points, and preferences to develop customized personalization rules, content templates, and engagement strategies for each target industry

subtasks.title: Account-based Personalization
subtasks.description: Implement personalization logic specifically designed for B2B account-based marketing and sales approaches
subtasks.details: Develop account-level profiling, stakeholder mapping, company-specific content delivery, and multi-touchpoint personalization across the entire buying committee

subtasks.title: Progressive Profiling Workflows
subtasks.description: Design and implement progressive data collection workflows that gradually build comprehensive user profiles without overwhelming visitors
subtasks.details: Create smart form logic, behavioral inference algorithms, and data enrichment processes that incrementally gather user information through multiple interactions and touchpoints

subtasks.title: A/B Testing Framework
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive testing infrastructure for validating personalization strategies and optimizing conversion rates
subtasks.details: Implement statistical testing methodology, experiment design tools, multivariate testing capabilities, and automated winner selection with confidence intervals and significance testing

subtasks.title: Dynamic Content Delivery
subtasks.description: Develop system for real-time content adaptation and delivery based on user profiles and contextual factors
subtasks.details: Create content management system with dynamic rendering, template engine, asset optimization, and real-time content selection algorithms based on personalization rules

subtasks.title: Automated Experience Customization
subtasks.description: Build intelligent automation layer that customizes entire user experiences based on behavioral patterns and preferences
subtasks.details: Implement machine learning models for experience optimization, automated journey mapping, predictive personalization, and self-learning recommendation engines

subtasks.title: Platform Integration Layer
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive integration framework connecting personalization system with existing marketing and sales technology stack
subtasks.details: Develop APIs, webhooks, and connectors for CRM, marketing automation, analytics platforms, and third-party data sources with real-time data synchronization

subtasks.title: Performance Optimization Tracking
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive monitoring and analytics system to track personalization performance and ROI
subtasks.details: Build dashboard with conversion tracking, engagement metrics, personalization effectiveness scoring, and automated reporting with actionable insights and optimization recommendations

tasks.title: Develop Executive Revenue Intelligence Dashboard
tasks.description: Build the C-level dashboard providing real-time pipeline value tracking, revenue attribution reporting, and strategic account intelligence with executive-focused visualizations.
tasks.details:
Create executive dashboard with:
- Real-time pipeline value display from website traffic
- Revenue forecasting based on visitor activity and predictions
- Account-based visitor intelligence with target account tracking
- Competitive activity monitoring and market trend analysis
- Campaign attribution and channel performance ROI
- Executive-level KPI tracking (conversion velocity, account penetration)
- Interactive visualizations using Recharts optimized for C-level consumption
- Mobile-responsive design for executive access
- Automated reporting and alert systems
- Integration with existing business intelligence tools
tasks.testStrategy: Validate real-time data accuracy, test dashboard performance under load, verify executive-level metric calculations, and ensure mobile responsiveness. Conduct user testing with C-level personas.

subtasks.title: Real-time Pipeline Visualization
subtasks.description: Develop interactive pipeline visualization components showing deal progression, stage conversions, and real-time updates with drag-and-drop functionality and customizable views.
subtasks.details: Create dynamic pipeline charts, funnel visualizations, deal cards with real-time status updates, stage-based filtering, and interactive elements for deal management. Include velocity metrics and bottleneck identification.

subtasks.title: Revenue Forecasting Components
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive revenue forecasting dashboard with predictive analytics, scenario modeling, and trend analysis visualization components.
subtasks.details: Implement forecasting charts, confidence intervals, historical vs predicted revenue comparisons, scenario planning tools, and drill-down capabilities by territory, product, or time period.

subtasks.title: Account Intelligence Displays
subtasks.description: Create account-centric intelligence interfaces showing customer health scores, engagement metrics, expansion opportunities, and relationship mapping.
subtasks.details: Design account overview cards, health score indicators, activity timelines, contact relationship maps, and opportunity identification widgets with actionable insights.

subtasks.title: Competitive Monitoring Interface
subtasks.description: Develop competitive intelligence dashboard displaying market positioning, win/loss analysis, competitor tracking, and competitive battlecards.
subtasks.details: Build competitor comparison tables, win/loss ratio charts, competitive deal alerts, market share visualizations, and dynamic battlecard generation with real-time updates.

subtasks.title: Campaign Attribution Reporting
subtasks.description: Implement multi-touch attribution reporting system with campaign performance tracking, ROI analysis, and conversion path visualization.
subtasks.details: Create attribution models visualization, campaign performance dashboards, conversion funnel analysis, ROI calculators, and cross-channel impact reporting with customizable attribution windows.

subtasks.title: Executive KPI Tracking
subtasks.description: Build executive-level KPI dashboard with high-level metrics, goal tracking, performance indicators, and strategic insights for C-level decision making.
subtasks.details: Design executive summary cards, goal progress indicators, trend analysis charts, performance scorecards, and strategic recommendation panels with drill-down capabilities to underlying data.

subtasks.title: Mobile-Responsive Design Implementation
subtasks.description: Ensure all dashboard components are fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices with touch-friendly interfaces and adaptive layouts.
subtasks.details: Implement responsive breakpoints, touch gestures, mobile-optimized charts, collapsible sections, and progressive disclosure patterns. Ensure performance optimization for mobile networks.

tasks.title: Build Sales Intelligence Interface and Lead Management System
tasks.description: Create the sales team interface for hot account identification, lead scoring, territory management, and automated lead routing with CRM integration.
tasks.details:
Implement sales intelligence platform with:
- Hot accounts dashboard showing high-intent prospects with company details
- Individual visitor intelligence with behavioral context and recommended actions
- Territory-specific performance tracking and quota management
- Automated lead routing based on revenue scores and sales rep assignments
- Real-time notifications for high-value prospects (Slack/Teams integration)
- Lead qualification workflows with progressive profiling
- Sales rep mobile application for on-the-go access
- Activity tracking and sales velocity metrics
- Integration with existing sales processes and methodologies
tasks.testStrategy: Test lead routing accuracy, validate sales notification systems, measure sales team adoption rates, and verify territory management functionality. Track improvement in lead qualification efficiency.

subtasks.title: Hot Accounts Dashboard
subtasks.description: Develop a comprehensive dashboard that displays high-priority accounts with real-time engagement metrics, scoring algorithms, and visual indicators for sales teams to prioritize their efforts effectively.
subtasks.details: Create interactive dashboard with account scoring, engagement heatmaps, activity timelines, and customizable filters. Include drill-down capabilities for detailed account analysis and integration with CRM data sources.

subtasks.title: Visitor Intelligence Interface
subtasks.description: Build an interface that tracks and analyzes website visitor behavior, identifying potential leads through behavioral patterns, page interactions, and engagement metrics.
subtasks.details: Implement visitor tracking system with behavioral analytics, lead identification algorithms, company enrichment data, and visitor journey mapping. Include anonymous visitor identification and progressive profiling capabilities.

subtasks.title: Territory Management System
subtasks.description: Create a system for managing sales territories, assigning accounts to representatives, and optimizing territory coverage based on geographic, industry, or account size criteria.
subtasks.details: Develop territory mapping tools, account assignment algorithms, performance analytics by territory, and territory optimization recommendations. Include visual territory maps and workload balancing features.

subtasks.title: Automated Lead Routing
subtasks.description: Implement an intelligent lead routing system that automatically assigns leads to appropriate sales representatives based on predefined rules, territory assignments, and workload distribution.
subtasks.details: Build rule-based routing engine with round-robin, weighted distribution, and skill-based routing options. Include lead scoring integration, escalation workflows, and routing performance analytics.

subtasks.title: Real-time Notification System
subtasks.description: Develop a comprehensive notification system that delivers instant alerts to sales teams about hot leads, account activities, and important sales events across multiple channels.
subtasks.details: Create multi-channel notification system supporting email, SMS, in-app, and push notifications. Include notification preferences, priority levels, escalation rules, and delivery confirmation tracking.

subtasks.title: Lead Qualification Workflows
subtasks.description: Design and implement automated workflows for lead qualification, including scoring mechanisms, qualification criteria, and progressive nurturing sequences based on lead behavior and characteristics.
subtasks.details: Build workflow automation engine with lead scoring models, qualification stages, automated follow-up sequences, and integration with marketing automation. Include A/B testing capabilities for workflow optimization.

subtasks.title: Mobile Application Development
subtasks.description: Develop native mobile applications for iOS and Android that provide sales teams with on-the-go access to leads, accounts, notifications, and key sales functionalities.
subtasks.details: Create responsive mobile apps with offline capabilities, push notifications, lead management, account access, and activity logging. Include mobile-optimized dashboards and integration with device features like GPS and camera.

subtasks.title: Sales Velocity Tracking
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive sales velocity analytics that track deal progression, identify bottlenecks, and provide insights into sales cycle optimization and performance metrics.
subtasks.details: Build analytics engine with sales cycle tracking, velocity calculations, bottleneck identification, forecasting models, and performance benchmarking. Include customizable reports and predictive analytics for sales outcomes.

tasks.title: Implement CRM Integration and Data Synchronization
tasks.description: Build robust integrations with major CRM platforms (Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive) for bidirectional data sync, lead scoring updates, and automated workflow triggers.
tasks.details:
Develop CRM integration system with:
- OAuth 2.0 authentication with API key rotation for security
- Bidirectional data synchronization for leads, contacts, and opportunities
- Real-time lead score updates in CRM systems
- Automated contact enrichment with visitor intelligence data
- Custom field mapping for revenue predictions and intent signals
- Duplicate detection and deduplication workflows
- Webhook integration for real-time CRM event processing
- Error handling and retry mechanisms for data consistency
- Audit logging for compliance and troubleshooting
- Support for custom CRM configurations and workflows
tasks.testStrategy: Test data synchronization accuracy, validate OAuth security implementation, verify duplicate handling, and ensure real-time updates work correctly. Test with multiple CRM configurations and data volumes.

subtasks.title: OAuth 2.0 Authentication System
subtasks.description: Implement secure OAuth 2.0 authentication system to handle authorization flows for multiple CRM platforms with token management and refresh capabilities
subtasks.details: Design and develop OAuth 2.0 client implementation supporting authorization code flow, token storage, automatic refresh, and multi-tenant authentication for various CRM providers including Salesforce, HubSpot, and Pipedrive

subtasks.title: Bidirectional Sync Engine
subtasks.description: Build core synchronization engine that handles bidirectional data flow between CRM systems with conflict resolution and data transformation capabilities
subtasks.details: Develop sync engine with change detection, conflict resolution algorithms, data mapping transformations, batch processing, and support for incremental and full synchronization modes

subtasks.title: Real-time Score Updates
subtasks.description: Implement real-time scoring system that calculates and updates lead/contact scores across integrated CRM platforms based on configurable criteria
subtasks.details: Create scoring engine with configurable rules, real-time calculation triggers, score propagation across CRMs, and performance optimization for high-volume updates

subtasks.title: Contact Enrichment Workflows
subtasks.description: Develop automated contact enrichment system that enhances contact data using external data sources and distributes enriched information across CRM platforms
subtasks.details: Build enrichment workflows integrating with data providers, validation rules, enrichment triggers, data quality scoring, and automated distribution of enriched contact information

subtasks.title: Custom Field Mapping
subtasks.description: Create flexible field mapping system that allows custom field transformations and mappings between different CRM platforms with varying data structures
subtasks.details: Implement dynamic field mapping interface, data type conversion, custom transformation functions, mapping validation, and support for complex nested field structures

subtasks.title: Duplicate Detection System
subtasks.description: Build intelligent duplicate detection and deduplication system that identifies and manages duplicate records across multiple CRM platforms
subtasks.details: Develop fuzzy matching algorithms, duplicate scoring, merge strategies, cross-platform duplicate detection, and automated/manual resolution workflows

subtasks.title: Webhook Processing
subtasks.description: Implement webhook processing system to handle real-time notifications from CRM platforms and trigger appropriate sync and enrichment actions
subtasks.details: Create webhook endpoint management, payload validation, event routing, retry mechanisms, and integration with sync engine for real-time data processing

subtasks.title: Error Handling Mechanisms
subtasks.description: Develop comprehensive error handling and recovery system for managing API failures, data conflicts, and system errors across all integration components
subtasks.details: Implement error classification, retry strategies, circuit breakers, fallback mechanisms, error notification system, and recovery workflows for various failure scenarios

subtasks.title: Audit Logging Implementation
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive audit logging system to track all data changes, sync operations, and system activities for compliance and troubleshooting purposes
subtasks.details: Build audit trail system with detailed logging, data lineage tracking, compliance reporting, log retention policies, and searchable audit interface for monitoring and debugging

tasks.title: Create Built-in Revenue Automation Engine
tasks.description: Develop the event-driven automation system that triggers sales actions, marketing campaigns, and account-based workflows based on visitor intelligence and revenue predictions.
tasks.details:
Build automation engine with:
- Event-driven workflow system with configurable triggers and actions
- Enterprise prospect detection with VIP experience activation
- Competitive intelligence workflows with battlecard deployment
- Account-based marketing automation for target accounts
- Revenue attribution tracking across all automated actions
- Integration with marketing automation platforms (Marketo, Pardot, Mailchimp)
- Automated email sequences based on visitor behavior and intent
- Sales alert system with context and recommended actions
- Performance tracking and ROI measurement for automated workflows
- Rule-based customization for different industries and company sizes
tasks.testStrategy: Test automation trigger accuracy, validate workflow execution reliability, measure automation ROI impact, and verify integration with marketing platforms. Test scalability with high-volume automation scenarios.

subtasks.title: Design Event-Driven Workflow System Architecture
subtasks.description: Create the foundational event-driven architecture that will handle workflow triggers, event processing, and system orchestration across all marketing and sales automation components.
subtasks.details: Design event bus architecture, define event schemas, implement event routing mechanisms, and establish workflow execution engine with state management capabilities.

subtasks.title: Implement Enterprise Prospect Detection Engine
subtasks.description: Build automated prospect identification system that monitors multiple data sources to detect and qualify potential enterprise customers based on predefined criteria.
subtasks.details: Develop data ingestion pipelines, implement prospect scoring algorithms, create qualification rules engine, and establish prospect enrichment workflows.

subtasks.title: Build Competitive Intelligence Workflows
subtasks.description: Create automated workflows for gathering, analyzing, and distributing competitive intelligence data to support strategic decision-making and sales enablement.
subtasks.details: Implement competitor monitoring systems, build intelligence analysis pipelines, create automated reporting mechanisms, and establish alert systems for competitive changes.

subtasks.title: Develop Account-Based Marketing Automation Platform
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive ABM automation system that orchestrates personalized marketing campaigns across multiple channels for target accounts.
subtasks.details: Create account segmentation engine, implement multi-channel campaign orchestration, build personalization algorithms, and establish account journey tracking.

subtasks.title: Implement Revenue Attribution Tracking System
subtasks.description: Build sophisticated attribution modeling system that tracks and analyzes the impact of marketing activities on revenue generation across the entire customer journey.
subtasks.details: Develop multi-touch attribution models, implement revenue tracking mechanisms, create attribution reporting dashboards, and establish ROI calculation engines.

subtasks.title: Build Marketing Platform Integration Hub
subtasks.description: Create centralized integration platform that connects with various marketing tools, CRM systems, and data sources to enable seamless data flow and workflow automation.
subtasks.details: Implement API connectors for major marketing platforms, build data synchronization mechanisms, create integration monitoring systems, and establish error handling protocols.

subtasks.title: Develop Automated Email Sequence Engine
subtasks.description: Build intelligent email automation system that creates and manages personalized email sequences based on prospect behavior, engagement patterns, and workflow triggers.
subtasks.details: Implement email template management, build behavioral trigger systems, create A/B testing capabilities, and establish deliverability optimization features.

subtasks.title: Create Sales Alert and Notification System
subtasks.description: Build real-time alert system that notifies sales teams of important prospect activities, opportunities, and workflow events to enable timely follow-up actions.
subtasks.details: Implement real-time event monitoring, build alert routing mechanisms, create notification preference management, and establish escalation protocols.

subtasks.title: Build Performance Tracking and Analytics Dashboard
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive analytics platform that tracks workflow performance, campaign effectiveness, and system metrics with real-time reporting capabilities.
subtasks.details: Implement metrics collection systems, build interactive dashboards, create automated reporting mechanisms, and establish performance benchmarking tools.

subtasks.title: Develop Rule Customization Engine
subtasks.description: Build flexible rule engine that allows users to create, modify, and manage custom business rules for workflows, triggers, and automation logic without technical expertise.
subtasks.details: Implement visual rule builder interface, create rule validation systems, build rule testing environments, and establish rule versioning and deployment mechanisms.

tasks.title: Implement Marketing Attribution and Content Intelligence System
tasks.description: Build comprehensive marketing attribution tracking, content performance analysis, and audience segmentation based on revenue impact and conversion optimization.
tasks.details:
Develop marketing analytics with:
- Full-funnel revenue attribution across all marketing channels
- Content performance tracking with revenue impact measurement
- Campaign ROI analysis with pipeline value attribution
- Audience segmentation based on revenue potential and behavior
- A/B testing framework for content and campaign optimization
- Integration with marketing analytics platforms (Google Analytics, Adobe)
- Attribution modeling for multi-touch customer journeys
- Content recommendation engine based on visitor intelligence
- Marketing qualified lead (MQL) scoring and progression tracking
- Automated reporting for marketing team performance metrics
tasks.testStrategy: Validate attribution accuracy across multiple touchpoints, test content performance correlation with revenue outcomes, verify audience segmentation effectiveness, and measure marketing ROI improvement.

subtasks.title: Analytics Platform Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate with major analytics platforms (Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, Facebook Analytics) to collect and consolidate marketing data from multiple sources
subtasks.details: Set up API connections, data pipelines, and real-time sync mechanisms with analytics platforms. Implement data validation and error handling for reliable data collection.

subtasks.title: Audience Segmentation Engine
subtasks.description: Build dynamic audience segmentation system based on behavioral, demographic, and engagement data to create targeted marketing segments
subtasks.details: Develop machine learning algorithms for automatic segmentation, create custom segment builders, and implement real-time segment updates based on user actions.

subtasks.title: Attribution Modeling Framework
subtasks.description: Implement multi-touch attribution models (first-touch, last-touch, linear, time-decay, position-based) to track customer journey touchpoints
subtasks.details: Build attribution algorithms, create custom attribution rules engine, and implement cross-device tracking capabilities for accurate attribution analysis.

subtasks.title: Full-Funnel Attribution Tracking
subtasks.description: Develop comprehensive tracking system to monitor customer interactions across all marketing touchpoints from awareness to conversion
subtasks.details: Implement cross-channel tracking, create unified customer journey mapping, and build attribution weighting system for multi-channel campaigns.

subtasks.title: Content Performance Analysis
subtasks.description: Create content analytics engine to measure engagement, conversion rates, and ROI for different content types across channels
subtasks.details: Build content scoring algorithms, implement content attribution tracking, and create performance benchmarking system for content optimization.

subtasks.title: Campaign ROI Measurement
subtasks.description: Develop comprehensive ROI calculation system for marketing campaigns with cost attribution and revenue tracking capabilities
subtasks.details: Implement cost tracking integration, build revenue attribution models, and create ROI calculation engine with support for different attribution windows.

subtasks.title: A/B Testing Framework
subtasks.description: Build statistical testing platform for campaign optimization with experiment design, statistical significance testing, and result analysis
subtasks.details: Implement statistical testing algorithms, create experiment management interface, and build automated winner detection with confidence intervals.

subtasks.title: Automated Reporting System
subtasks.description: Create automated dashboard and reporting system with customizable reports, scheduled delivery, and real-time performance monitoring
subtasks.details: Build report generation engine, implement scheduled reporting with email/Slack integration, and create interactive dashboards with drill-down capabilities.

tasks.title: Build Enterprise Security and Compliance Framework
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive security measures, data governance, and compliance features for enterprise customers including SOC2, GDPR, and role-based access control.
tasks.details:
Implement enterprise security with:
- AES-256 encryption at rest and TLS 1.3 in transit
- SOC2 Type II compliant audit logging and monitoring
- GDPR Article 17 compliance with right to forget functionality
- Role-based access control (RBAC) with SSO integration
- Data residency compliance for US, EU, and APAC regions
- Anonymous data processing with public source enrichment only
- 24-month data retention with automated purging
- Security monitoring and threat detection
- Compliance reporting and audit trail generation
- Enterprise-grade backup and disaster recovery
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct security penetration testing, validate GDPR compliance workflows, test RBAC permissions, verify encryption implementation, and ensure audit logging completeness. Obtain SOC2 certification.

subtasks.title: Encryption Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive encryption for data at rest and in transit using industry-standard algorithms and key management systems
subtasks.details: Design and implement AES-256 encryption for data at rest, TLS 1.3 for data in transit, establish secure key management infrastructure, implement encryption key rotation policies, and ensure proper certificate management

subtasks.title: SOC2 Compliance Setup
subtasks.description: Establish SOC2 Type II compliance framework including security controls, policies, and procedures
subtasks.details: Implement security controls for Trust Service Criteria, establish security policies and procedures, set up access controls, implement change management processes, and prepare for SOC2 audit requirements

subtasks.title: GDPR Compliance Features
subtasks.description: Implement GDPR-specific features including data subject rights, consent management, and privacy controls
subtasks.details: Build data subject access request system, implement right to erasure functionality, create consent management interface, establish data processing records, and implement privacy by design principles

subtasks.title: RBAC System
subtasks.description: Design and implement Role-Based Access Control system with granular permissions and hierarchical roles
subtasks.details: Create role hierarchy structure, implement permission matrix, build user role assignment interface, establish principle of least privilege, and implement dynamic access control evaluation

subtasks.title: SSO Integration
subtasks.description: Implement Single Sign-On integration supporting SAML 2.0, OAuth 2.0, and OpenID Connect protocols
subtasks.details: Integrate with major identity providers (Azure AD, Okta, Google Workspace), implement SAML 2.0 and OAuth 2.0 flows, establish user provisioning and deprovisioning, and implement session management

subtasks.title: Data Residency Management
subtasks.description: Implement data residency controls to ensure data storage and processing compliance with regional regulations
subtasks.details: Build data classification system, implement geographic data storage controls, create data transfer mechanisms, establish cross-border data transfer safeguards, and implement data localization features

subtasks.title: Audit Logging System
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive audit logging system for all security-relevant events and user activities
subtasks.details: Design audit log schema, implement tamper-proof logging mechanisms, create log retention policies, establish log analysis capabilities, and ensure immutable audit trail generation

subtasks.title: Security Monitoring
subtasks.description: Implement real-time security monitoring and threat detection system with automated alerting
subtasks.details: Set up SIEM integration, implement anomaly detection algorithms, create security dashboards, establish incident response workflows, and implement automated threat detection rules

subtasks.title: Compliance Reporting
subtasks.description: Build automated compliance reporting system for SOC2, GDPR, and other regulatory requirements
subtasks.details: Create compliance dashboard, implement automated report generation, establish compliance metrics tracking, build evidence collection system, and create audit-ready documentation

subtasks.title: Disaster Recovery Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive disaster recovery and business continuity plan with automated failover capabilities
subtasks.details: Design disaster recovery architecture, implement automated backup systems, create failover procedures, establish recovery time objectives, and implement business continuity testing protocols

tasks.title: Develop Real-time Performance Optimization and Monitoring
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive performance monitoring, real-time optimization, and scalability features to handle enterprise-level traffic and ensure sub-200ms response times.
tasks.details:
Build performance optimization with:
- Real-time monitoring for API endpoints (<200ms response time)
- WebSocket server optimization for live updates
- Database query optimization with read replicas
- Redis cluster configuration for high availability
- CDN integration for global script delivery
- Auto-scaling configuration for 10,000+ concurrent visitors
- Performance analytics and bottleneck identification
- Caching strategies for frequently accessed data
- Load balancing and failover mechanisms
- 99.95% uptime monitoring with enterprise SLA compliance
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct load testing with 10,000+ concurrent users, measure API response times under various loads, test failover scenarios, and validate auto-scaling functionality. Monitor system performance in production.

subtasks.title: API Performance Monitoring
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive API performance monitoring system with real-time metrics tracking, alerting, and performance baseline establishment
subtasks.details: Set up monitoring tools to track API response times, throughput, error rates, and resource utilization. Configure dashboards and alerts for performance degradation detection with sub-200ms response time targets.

subtasks.title: WebSocket Optimization
subtasks.description: Optimize WebSocket connections for real-time communication with connection pooling, message compression, and efficient event handling
subtasks.details: Implement WebSocket connection management, message batching, heartbeat mechanisms, and optimize for low-latency real-time data transmission while monitoring performance metrics.

subtasks.title: Database Optimization
subtasks.description: Optimize database performance through query optimization, indexing strategies, connection pooling, and read/write separation
subtasks.details: Analyze and optimize database queries, implement proper indexing, configure connection pooling, set up read replicas, and establish database performance monitoring to achieve sub-200ms response times.

subtasks.title: Redis Clustering
subtasks.description: Set up Redis clustering for high-availability caching and session management with automatic failover and data distribution
subtasks.details: Configure Redis cluster with multiple nodes, implement data sharding, set up replication, configure failover mechanisms, and optimize for high-throughput caching operations.

subtasks.title: CDN Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate Content Delivery Network for static asset optimization and global content distribution
subtasks.details: Configure CDN for static assets, implement cache headers, set up edge locations, optimize content delivery paths, and integrate with monitoring systems for performance tracking.

subtasks.title: Auto-scaling Configuration
subtasks.description: Configure auto-scaling policies for dynamic resource allocation based on performance metrics and traffic patterns
subtasks.details: Set up horizontal and vertical auto-scaling rules, configure scaling triggers based on CPU, memory, and response time metrics, implement graceful scaling policies to maintain performance targets.

subtasks.title: Performance Analytics
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive performance analytics system for tracking, analyzing, and reporting system performance metrics
subtasks.details: Set up analytics dashboards, implement performance trend analysis, configure automated reporting, and establish performance benchmarking with historical data comparison and predictive insights.

subtasks.title: Caching Strategies
subtasks.description: Implement multi-level caching strategies including application-level, database, and distributed caching for optimal performance
subtasks.details: Design and implement caching layers at application, database, and CDN levels, configure cache invalidation strategies, implement cache warming, and optimize cache hit ratios for sub-200ms response times.

subtasks.title: Load Balancing Setup
subtasks.description: Configure advanced load balancing with health checks, traffic distribution algorithms, and failover mechanisms
subtasks.details: Set up load balancers with multiple algorithms, implement health checks, configure session affinity, set up SSL termination, and integrate with auto-scaling for dynamic traffic distribution.

tasks.title: Create Comprehensive Testing Suite and Quality Assurance Framework
tasks.description: Develop extensive testing coverage including business logic validation, integration testing, performance testing, and A/B testing framework for continuous optimization.
tasks.details:
Implement comprehensive testing with:
- Unit tests for revenue prediction algorithms and business logic
- Integration tests for CRM synchronization and data consistency
- Performance tests for enterprise-scale concurrent usage
- End-to-end tests for complete user workflows
- A/B testing framework for dashboard optimization and sales efficiency
- Automated testing pipeline with CI/CD integration
- Revenue prediction accuracy validation with backtesting
- Cross-platform compatibility testing for tracking script
- Security testing for compliance and data protection
- User acceptance testing with target customer segments
tasks.testStrategy: Achieve 90%+ code coverage, validate 92%+ prediction accuracy, ensure all integration tests pass, and conduct user acceptance testing with B2B customers. Implement continuous testing in CI/CD pipeline.

subtasks.title: Unit Testing Implementation
subtasks.description: Develop comprehensive unit tests for individual components, functions, and modules to ensure code quality and functionality at the smallest testable level.
subtasks.details: Create unit tests covering all core business logic, utility functions, data models, and service classes. Implement test fixtures, mocks, and stubs. Achieve minimum 80% code coverage with focus on critical paths and edge cases.

subtasks.title: Integration Testing Suite
subtasks.description: Build integration tests to verify proper interaction between different system components, services, and external dependencies.
subtasks.details: Design tests for API integrations, database connections, third-party service interactions, and inter-service communication. Include contract testing and service boundary validation.

subtasks.title: Performance Testing Framework
subtasks.description: Establish performance testing infrastructure to measure system response times, throughput, and resource utilization under various load conditions.
subtasks.details: Implement load testing, stress testing, and scalability testing. Set up monitoring for response times, memory usage, CPU utilization, and database performance. Define performance benchmarks and SLA requirements.

subtasks.title: End-to-End Testing
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive end-to-end test scenarios that validate complete user workflows and system functionality from start to finish.
subtasks.details: Develop automated E2E tests covering critical user journeys, cross-browser compatibility, and multi-device scenarios. Include UI automation, data flow validation, and business process verification.

subtasks.title: A/B Testing Infrastructure
subtasks.description: Build infrastructure to support A/B testing capabilities for feature experimentation and data-driven decision making.
subtasks.details: Implement feature flagging system, experiment configuration management, statistical analysis tools, and result tracking mechanisms. Ensure proper user segmentation and randomization.

subtasks.title: Automated Testing Pipeline
subtasks.description: Integrate all testing components into a comprehensive CI/CD pipeline for automated test execution and continuous quality assurance.
subtasks.details: Configure automated test execution triggers, parallel test running, test result reporting, and failure notifications. Implement test environment provisioning and teardown automation.

subtasks.title: Accuracy Validation System
subtasks.description: Develop specialized testing framework to validate system accuracy, data integrity, and algorithmic correctness.
subtasks.details: Create validation tests for data processing accuracy, calculation correctness, and output verification. Implement regression testing for model accuracy and data quality checks.

subtasks.title: User Acceptance Testing Coordination
subtasks.description: Establish processes and tools for coordinating user acceptance testing with stakeholders and end users.
subtasks.details: Set up UAT environment, create test scenarios documentation, coordinate with business stakeholders, manage feedback collection, and track acceptance criteria completion.
